room_title: Escape room "House of CARS Steampunk Mansion" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Our family LOVES Escape Rooms. We have done between 6-8. Riddles had a great price and their theming was amazing. Very logical room, Lots of props on our room- Steampunk Mansion. Our host, Duncan, was a great help too!

room_title: Escape room "House of CARS Steampunk Mansion" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: What an awesome place! Staff was amazing and helpful and the House of C.A.R.S. room was genius! Can't wait to try another room! Thanks for great memories made!

room_title: Escape room "House of CARS Steampunk Mansion" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: We had a blast from the moment we got there! We escaped the room CARS. This is most fun we've had in a while and we'll definitely be going back to escape the other rooms. The owners are amazing as well!
